PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02122018-03-06GAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAmendment to Annex III of the Rotterdam Convention on the Prior Informed Consent Procedure for Certain Hazardous Chemicals and Pesticides in International Trade
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to BRING INTO FORCE for Canada, the AMENDMENT TO ANNEX III OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted at Geneva on 24 April to 5 May 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
